channel.title: What is Markdown :: Hugo Book
channel.description: Markdown is a lightweight markup language that you can use to format plain text documents. Write docs for your GitHub projects, edit your GitHub profile README etc. You fill find it all here. Let’s dive into it. ⤵️ Table of Contents ⬇️ The Only Markdown Cheatsheet You Need - ⚠️ Note What is Markdown? Table of Contents Paragraph Headings Heading 1 Heading 2 Heading 3 Heading 4 Heading 5 Heading 6 Emphasis Blockquote Images Links Code Lists Ordered List Unordered List Mixed List Table Task List Footnote I am working on a new project. [^1] Hope you will like it. [^see] Jump to section Horizontal Line HTML - Section with some ID Paragraph By writing regular text you are basically writing a paragraph.
